thread.title: Brent Barry daringly wore a 'Kazaam' pin while sitting next to Shaq on live TV
thread.title_full: Brent Barry daringly wore a 'Kazaam' pin while sitting next to Shaq on live TV

author: James Dator
title: Brent Barry daringly wore a 'Kazaam' pin while sitting next to Shaq on live TV
text:
Shaq was joined by a ghost of his past during TNT’s broadcast of Clippers vs. Knicks on Monday night.
Shouts to Brent Barry for wearing our @pattilapel Kazaam pin RIGHT NEXT TO SHAQ. You're a king. pic.twitter.com/glCI31lCYM 
— Jensen Karp (@JensenClan88) March 21, 2017 Brent Barry was extremely excited to be wearing a Kazaam lapel pin as a subtle reminder of that time Shaq actually played a genie in one of the worst-rated movies of all time on Rotten Tomatoes.
The best part isn’t that Barry rocked the pin. It’s that there’s a company that makes bizarre lapel pins like this. Patti Lapel is making some really neat stuff, and here are some of the best sports-related ones it offers:
Key and Peele’s fake Pro Bowl names. 
via Patti Lapel A Ray Finkle jersey from Ace Ventura: Pet Detective :
via Patti Lapel And who could forget that classic Dwayne Johnson look? 
via Patti Lapel Wearing that lapel pin was a power move by Barry with Shaq right next to him, and for that he deserves some praise.
